examples: The Conservation Trust performs an instrumental role in the protection of rural environments.
instrumental in (doing) something He was instrumental in bringing about an end to the conflict.
They were highly instrumental in bringing the business to Newtown.

meanings.def: made by or for musical instruments
in the form that a noun, pronoun or adjective has when it refers to a thing that is used to do something
a piece of music (usually popular music) in which only musical instruments are used with no singing
the form of a noun, pronoun or adjective when it refers to a thing that is used to do something
